name: Arcade Pool (itch)
description:
Arcade Pool

Arcade Pool is a fast and fun version of 8-ball pool, with both a 1 player mode against an AI opponent and a 2 player mode (locally) against your friends.

How to Play - Ball in Hand

  • Click/Drag to Move
  • Right Click to OK

How to Play - Game

  • Mouse to Aim
  • Click/Drag for Power
  • Release to Shoot

How to Play - Spin

You can change your spin by moving the red dot on the cue ball icon in the bottom right of the screen. Simply Click/Drag the red dot.

After you've taken your shot the spin will reset, ready for your next shot.

Customize your game

  • 5x Tables
  • 3x Racks
  • 2x Ball Colors (Color-blind friendly)

Thanks for playing!
